titles.title: SONG Act
SONG Act
Stadiums Operating under New Guidance Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation, acting through the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration, to revise section 91.145 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations, such that the term "sporting" does not limit the types of major events described in such section.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Stadiums Operating under New Guidance Act or the SONG Act
This bill revises the authority of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to issue temporary flight restrictions for sporting events.
The bill requires the FAA to revise the meaning of "sporting" to include all major events held in stadiums, including concerts.
